name: DarkAges
description:
Description:

This game is mix of a "Tower Defense" and "Slasher". 

You play as a Knight of Light who must save his village from creeping shadows that want to corrupt light from the lighthouse of life. The goal is to survive as many waves of enemies as possible. To do so you need to rebuilt towers, upgrade them with light shards, and increase your survivability by gaining Health potions.

In the game we have two modes "Wave mode" and "Upgrade mode" after each won wave you can spend the captured light shards to improve or buy towers.

To win the "Wave mode" you have to beat all the shadows in the currently played wave. The game ends when your HP is 0 or when the light is fully corrupted.

How to play:
  • W A S D - move your character
  • Space - Jump
  • Mouse - Camera 
  • Left Mouse Button - Attack / Select Tower in "Upgrade Mode"
  • E - use potion
  • Escape - Quit game
